attributes.action: keep Coursework for year 10 and 11 students in GCSE's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hello,
i think that coursework should be kept due to the fact that many people do better in coursework than in exams.
this is also due to the fact that many/most students actually get a good 30% of their coursework done in lesson time. this means two things.
1. they can't cheat.
2. curriculum would have to be seriously altered to compensate for the lack of coursework time.

please sign this petition and keep coursework.
